title: What is this typeface?
content:
Can you please help me identify what this typeface is? It's currently used throughout all government ministries branding in the Netherlands. Check image attached. Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418080525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-ministerie-defensie_4973.png)
author: sarah_abelnica

comments.content:
The typeface is Rijksoverheid by Peter Verheul  
 [http://www.farhill.nl/01\_typefaces/Rijksoverheid.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418080525/http:/www.farhill.nl/01_typefaces/Rijksoverheid.html "http://www.farhill.nl/01\_typefaces/Rijksoverheid.html")
